medical_history.chief_complaint: Wrist and back pain following a fall.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began after a fall from standing height while consuming alcohol and marijuana, with initial wrist and back pain. The back pain worsened and accompanied new symptoms of lower extremity weakness, urinary incontinence, and fecal incontinence the following day.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Paranoid schizophrenia and a previous cesarean delivery.
medical_history.social_history: The patient was consuming alcohol and marijuana prior to the fall.
